description: This file contains macro definitions, function declarations, and include statements related to GPON manager hardware abstraction layer parameters. It appears to be a header file defining interfaces and constants used for GPON DML (Data Model Layer) interactions within the project.

methods.name: Map_hal_dml_pm
methods.description: Maps the physical media parameters between HAL and DML structures.

methods.name: Map_hal_dml_gtc
methods.description: Maps GTC (G-PON transmission convergence) data structures.

methods.name: Map_hal_dml_ploam
methods.description: Maps PLOAM (Physical Layer OAM) message structures.

methods.name: Map_hal_dml_omci
methods.description: Maps OMCI (ONT Management and Control Interface) data structures.

methods.name: Map_hal_dml_gem
methods.description: Maps GEM (G-PON Encapsulation Method) list structures.

methods.name: Map_hal_dml_veip
methods.description: Maps VEIP (Virtual Ethernet Interface Point) list structures.

methods.name: gpon_hal_get_pm_index
methods.description: Retrieves index for a physical media parameter based on its name.

methods.name: gpon_hal_get_gem_index
methods.description: Retrieves index for a GEM object based on its name.

methods.name: gpon_hal_get_veip_index
methods.description: Retrieves index for a VEIP object based on its name.
